attributes.action: Reinstate Karen Reissmann and bring the full force of the law to bear on the injustice brought about by the so called appeal committee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: E-petitions are suitable for requesting changes to Government policy, not individual legal cases and the like. Your concerns should be taken directly to the Department of Health.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
